name: GNCheckView
summary: A UIView subclass that allows animating smoothly between a checked and an unchecked state.
description:
A UIView subclass that allows animating smoothly between a checked and an unchecked state, meant to provide a sleeker alternative to the UITableViewAccessoryCheckmark or any other of your check marking needs!.
                    * Markdown format.
                    * Don't worry about the indent, we strip it!
